typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(JOB),
	sum_salary = sum(toInteger(SAL)),
		max_sal = max(toInteger(SAL))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['aggregateemp1'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
